subject: p16826047
Findings: In comparison with the study of, there is mild decrease in the still substantial opacification along the mid and lower lateral chest wall on the right, most likely reflecting a loculated effusion. Apparent pleural catheter remains in place, as does the Port-A-Cath. Little overall change in the appearance of the heart and lungs.
